examples: But the houre commeth, and now it is, when the true adorers shal adore the Father in spirit and veritie.

entries.meaning: Someone who has a deep admiration, fondness or love (of someone or something).
examples: I who profess my self an Admirer, an Adorer of Reason, am obliged to own, that in some Cases the Sharpness of Ridicule can do more than the Strength of Argument.
